messages.subject: I just told Lexie
messages.msgSnippet: do your homework, young lady! She has a friend over, and the friend must do her homework before they can play chess or whatever.  So the friend is teaching
messages.messageBody:
"do your homework, young lady!"

She has a friend over, and the friend must do her homework before they
can play chess or whatever. So the friend is teaching Lexie how to
divide decimals... pretty funny. She just asked Lexie what times 7 was
less than 62 or something like that, and Lexie had the answer instantly,
but then she had to explain to Dana how she got the answer, which was of
course mental math, and Dana didn't get it... Of course, she has the
times tables memorized.... It's fun to listen to them do this homework.

Joylyn


--
